1.0.1.name: wordpress/english-level-test
1.0.1.description: This widget loads an http://www.englishleveltest.com widget inside an iframe with the theme as a parameter, bright and dark posibilities. Unlike the full http://www.englishleveltest.com version this one does NOT require any contact information to your visitors. Also a "powered by" link is displayed below the leveltest, it can be disabled from the widget configuration.
